# parent

**Instance Property**

The menu item whose submenu contains the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var parent: NSMenuItem? { get }
```

## Managing submenus

- **submenu**: The submenu of the menu item.
- **hasSubmenu**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the menu item has a submenu.
